snippet.title: Solitaire Lounge - Coming Soon
snippet.description:
Solitaire Lounge is now on Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=za.co.bitaura.solitairelounge

Please join our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/solitairelounge/

If you would like to see it on Steam, please give it the thumbs up on Greenlight:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=796507992

Please remember to also like this video! Every like helps us get a step closer to making this game available to you on your favorite platform.

Come play a modern Solitaire game based on classic Solitaire rules! ★★★★★

This is a modern Solitaire game with special effects and beautiful themes. It uses classic Solitaire rules and anyone can quickly pickup and play this game.

★★★ Adventure Mode ★★★

Play through adventure mode to unlock new themes and challenges!

★★★ Leaderboard ★★★

Work your way up the leaderboard with your high scores.
